description: Powers of a prime lucky number (A031157) but excluding lucky numbers (A000959).
example: In the first 23 members of A000959, {1, 3, 7, 9, 13, 15, 21, 25, 31, 33, 37, 43, 49, 51, 63, 67, 69, 73, 75, 79, 87, 93, 99}, 3 is a prime lucky number (A031157), 3^2 is also a lucky number but 3^3=27 and 3^4=81 are not lucky numbers so that are members of this sequence.
mathematica: lst = Range[1, 2*10^7, 2]; i = 2; While[i <= (len = Length[lst]) && (k = lst[[i]]) <= len, lst = Drop[lst, {k, len, k}]; i++ ]; p = Select[lst, PrimeQ@# &]; lst2 = {}; Do[k = 1; lmt = Floor@Log[ p[[n]], 10^7]; t = Table[p[[n]]^i, {i, 2, lmt}]; While[k < lmt - 1, If[ !MemberQ[lst, t[[k]] ], AppendTo[lst2, t[[k]] ]]; k++ ], {n, Length@p}]; Sort@lst2 - _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 12 2006
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Oct 09 2000
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 12 2006
